radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral sphenoid and ethmoid polyps, obstruction of both sphenoid and posterior ethmoid sinuses.
Normal signal in the clivus, opacification of the sphenoid sinus, posterior nasal cavity, and posterior ethmoid air cells.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Marked enlargement and lobulation of the urinary bladder, with bilateral hydronephrosis and hydroureter.
Several areas of bilateral pleural calcification and thickening consistent with the presence of asbestosis.
Several punctate foci of hyperintensity in the watershed area between the right anterior and middle cerebral arteries; expansion of the clivus with heterogeneous signal intensity.
Mild mucosal disease of the ethmoid air cells and a rind of soft tissue within the sphenoid sinus, without evidence of bony destruction.
Extensive marrow replacement within the clivus, with extension into the petrous apexes, cavernous sinuses, and greater wings of the sphenoid sinus.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI scan of the brain after discharge
radiographic_examinations.findings: Chronic inflammatory changes in the sphenoid sinus.
